summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingAnua BHA 2% Gentle Exfoliating Toner is a lightweight toner infused with 2% BHA to exfoliate dead skin cells and for clear and smaller looking pores.
details: DetailsBenefitsUltimate exfoliant for a radiant & smooth complexionFree Of: Denatured Alcohols / Parabens / Artificial Color / Oil / Silicones / Sulfates / Mineral Oil / Methylchloroisothiazolinone / Methylisothiazolinone / Animal Oils / Coal Tar DyesKey Ingredients2% BHA (Salicylic Acid): Unclogs and clears pores by exfoliating dead skin cellsPanthenol & 6 Ceramides: Help maintain the skin's moisture barrier by delivering hydrationTeatree Leaf Extracts & Hyaluronic Acid: Helps soothe and calm irritation caused by rednessResearch ResultsSkin irritation test completedAFTER 2 WEEKS:38.38% reduction in pore area24.98% reduction in the number of poresItem 2634271How To UseApply with your hands or a cotton pad, gently covering the face and neck.The product can also be used on affected areas of the body.At first, apply once every 2-3 days monitoring the skin's response, and adjust the usage period accordingly.When used in the mornings, be sure to apply sunscreen with SPF 30 or higher.IngredientsAqua (Water), Dipropylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Salicylic Acid, Pentylene Glycol, C12-14 Pareth-12, Octyldodeceth-16, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Sodium Citrate, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Xanthan Gum, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Disodium EDTA, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Extract, Panthenol, Ficus Carica (Fig) Fruit Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Tocopherol, Pueraria Lobata Root Extract, Ulmus Davidiana Root Extract, Pinus Palustris Leaf Extract, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Flower Extract, Ceramide NP, Zinc Sulfate, Triethylhexanoin, Cholesterol, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Glyceryl Stearate, Potassium C11-15 Alkyl Phosphate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ceramide NG, Phytosphingosine, Ceramide AP, Ceramide AS, Dimethicone, Ceramide NS, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Dimethylsilanol Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Potassium Hyaluronate, Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Dimethylsilanol, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Citrulline, Ornithine, Taurine, Tryptophan, Asparagine, Glycine, Glutamic Acid, Glutamine, Leucine, Lysine, Methionine, Valine, Serine, Cysteine, Aspartic Acid, Alanine, Arginine, Isoleucine, Histidine, Proline, Phenylalanine, Tyrosine, Threonine, Ceramide EOP.
how_to_use: Apply with your hands or a cotton pad, gently covering the face and neck.The product can also be used on affected areas of the body.At first, apply once every 2-3 days monitoring the skin's response, and adjust the usage period accordingly.When used in the mornings, be sure to apply sunscreen with SPF 30 or higher.

reviews.headline: My pauls choice alternative
reviews.comments: i really like this toner. glad that i can order from ulta now. i used to use pauls choice. but this is also a good one for the price

reviews.headline: Better than Paula choice ï¿¼
reviews.comments: I am highly satisfied with this product. I noticed immediate improvements in my skin tone, texture, acne scars, and hormonal acne. Additionally, it reduced the appearance of my smile while maintaining my skin's hydration throughout the night.

reviews.headline: Purchasing Paula's Choice next time
reviews.comments: I hope this product would be comparable to Paula's Choice 2% BHA exfoliating toner since it seems like they have similar ingredients. However, i did not notice any improvements in my oilness, skin tone evenness, or unclogged pores in the past ~3 months I've been using this. Disappointed that it didn't work for me. Ill be trying Paula's choice again once I finish this bottle of Anuva
